notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON READING PASSAGE
TOPIC: managerial revolution that has been taking place
characteristics of managerial revolution:
radical change in management of large companies
change from management by owners of privately owned companies
change to management by professional employees of publicly owned corporations
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON LISTENING PASSAGE
TOPIC: claim that managerial revolution is not taking place; (maybe evolution is taking place)
reasons to support this claim:
not a complete change from private to public ownership (many big companies still privately owned)
not a complete change from owner-managers to employee managers (many employee-managers also part owners)

check-list.item-text: I noted the main points of the reading passage.
I noted the main points of the listening passage.
I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
